GetRangeToUnit~`=~`function(unit,~`maxRange)~J ~`~`~`~`if~`not~`UnitExists(unit)~`or~`UnitIsFriend("player",~`unit)~`then~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`return~`nil~J ~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`~J ~`~`~`~`local~`minRange,~`maxRange~`=~`0,~`0~J ~`~`~`~`for~`_,~`items~`in~`ipairs(rangeItems)~`do~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`local~`range,~`item~`=~`items[1],~`items[2]~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`if~`IsItemInRange("item:"..item,~`unit)~`then~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`maxRange~`=~`range~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`break~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`minRange~`=~`range~J ~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`~J ~`~`~`~`return~`minRange,~`maxRange~J end~J ~J EnemiesInRange~`=~`function(minRange,~`maxRange,~`combatOnly)~`~`~`~`~J ~`~`~`~`local~`counter~`=~`0~J ~`~`~`~`for~`i~`=~`1,~`40~`do~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`local~`unit~`=~`"nameplate"..i~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`local~`min,~`max~`=~`GetRangeToUnit(unit)~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`if~`min~`and~`max~`and~`min~`>=~`minRange~`and~`max~`<=~`maxRange~`then~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`counter~`=~`counter~`+~`1~`~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`return~`counter~J end~J ~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`return~`cleaveResult~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`else~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`return~`0~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`end~`~`~`~`~J ~`~`~`~`end~J ~`~`~`~`return~`last~J end~J ~J ~J ~`~`~`~`if~`not~`lastRefreshAoE~`or~`lastRefreshAoE~`<~`GetTime()~`-~`refreshRate~`then~J ~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`lastRefreshAoE~`=~`GetTime()~J
